meaning: ▶ a surprised look 놀란 표정 ▶ I am surprised atby you. 네게 놀랐다. ▶ I was surprised to hear of his failure. 그가 실패했다는 말을 듣고 나는 놀랐다. ▶ He was surprised that his father had sold the farm. 그는 부친이 농장을 팔아버린 데에 놀랐다. ▶ You’ll be surprised how beautiful she is. 그녀가 아주 미인이어서 깜짝 놀랄 거야.
details:
sur·prised a. 놀란
▶ a surprised look 놀란 표정
▶ I am surprised at[by] you. 네게 놀랐다.
▶ I was surprised to hear of his failure. 그가 실패했다는 말을 듣고 나는 놀랐다.
▶ He was surprised that his father had sold the farm. 그는 부친이 농장을 팔아버린 데에 놀랐다.
▶ You’ll be surprised how beautiful she is. 그녀가 아주 미인이어서 깜짝 놀랄 거야.
I shouldn't[wouldn't] be surprised if[to learn] ... …에도 별로 놀라지 않을 것이다, 당연하다고 생각할 것이다
